title.en: SEA SaaS Expansion Â· AI Pipeline Boost

summary.en: Parallel outreach agents plus adaptive email/drip flows helped a B2B SaaS enter SG/MY/ID, validate ICPs, and double leads in 8 weeks.

en: Semantic market scan produced SEA ICPs and buyer personas, prioritizing three cohorts with dynamic list refresh.
Multi-agent cold outreach (calls + emails) auto-generated localized scripts/templates, A/B optimizing open/reply rates in real time.
Synced to CRM and Calendly to flag high-intent leads and trigger meetings automatically, cutting manual triage.
Shared GTM board aligned sales/ops/product with rapid iteration loops across channels.
Compliance guardrails applied DNC/unsubscribe rules and PDPA/GDPR checks to avoid early penalties.
In 8 weeks: replies up 2.1x, qualified leads +115% WoW, first deals closed via a top-3 local channel partner.

title.en: Cross-border Brand Â· Multilingual Smart Care

summary.en: 24/7 multilingual agents (EN/MS/ID/TH) for a DTC brand cut average response time to 30s and stabilized CSAT in new markets.

en: Built multilingual agents on top of brand KB, syncing catalog, shipping, and return policies with continuous learning loops.
Smart routing/priorities automated pre-sales, shipping follow-ups, and claims; complex tickets escalated with full context.
Integrated WhatsApp, Messenger, onsite chat, and email into a unified ticket view to preserve conversation state.
Tone/compliance monitor flagged risky wording to prevent bad reviews and platform penalties.
Response time dropped from 5 minutes to 30s; FCR reached 78% and CSAT stayed 4.8+ in new markets.
CS headcount down 35%; peak seasons handled without temp hiring while the team focused on high-value cases.

summary.en: Channel and compliance agents for an industrial vendor entering MENA/EU, securing first deals and distributors in 12 weeks.

en: Insight agents tracked tenders, infra programs, and policy shifts to produce a weekly opportunity radar.
Channel agents sourced distributors via chambers, expos, and LinkedIn, generating localized partner pitches.
Risk module checked KYC, sanctions, AML, and local certifications, issuing entry scores and remediation lists.
Legal agent drafted bilingual distributor agreements and SLAs covering tax, support, and privacy compliance.
Ops board aligned market/sales/legal/delivery into a transparent â€œopportunity-compliance-quote-contract-deliveryâ€ loop.
Within 12 weeks, 4 core distributors signed; sales cycle -28% and two high-risk deals were avoided.
